import { FormArray, FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AngularEditorConfig } from '@kolkov/angular-editor'; @Component({ selector: 'app-hero-page', templateUrl: './hero-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./hero-page.component.scss'], }) export class HeroPageComponent { htmlContent: any; notesForm: FormGroup; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { this.creteForm(); } editorConfig: AngularEditorConfig = { editable: true, spellcheck: true, height: '25rem', minHeight: '5rem', placeholder: 'Enter text here...', translate: 'no', width: '100%', toolbarPosition: 'bottom', outline: false, uploadWithCredentials: false, // if needed customClasses: [ // optional { name: 'quote', class: 'quote', }, { name: 'redText', class: 'redText', }, { name: 'titleText', class: 'titleText', tag: 'h1', }, ], }; creteForm() { this.notesForm = this.fb.group({ notes: this.fb.array([]), }); } get notes(): FormArray { return this.notesForm.get('notes') as FormArray; } addNotes() { let newGroup = this.fb.group({ note: '', }); this.notes.push(newGroup); } removeNote(i: number) { this.notes.removeAt(i); } submit() { console.log(this.notesForm.value); } }
